data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Reports Fixed After Significant Delay
data.Description: Google Search Console Performance reports are now all caught up after a long significant delay.

data.Title: Google Search Console Experiences Delays,  Not a Core Update
data.Description: Google Search Console performance reports are indeed catching up but the fresh data is being reprocessed and is not 100% accurate yet, the fresh data reports are off right now, Google needs a few days to fully reprocess it

data.Title: Google Search Console URL Inspection Tool Request Indexing Feature Doesn't Change Canonicalization
data.Description: Google's John Mueller said that using the request indexing feature in Google Search Console's URL Inspection Tool does not change canonicalization.

data.Title: Redirect Your Robots.txt to Your CDN for Easier Management
data.Description: You can redirect your main robots.txt to your CDN's robots.txt and manage it only there so you don't need to manage two robots.txt files, Google explains.

data.Title: Google Updates Image SEO Best Practices for Embedding Images
data.Description: Google updated its image SEO best practices "Use HTML image elements to embed images" section.

data.Title: Google Search Tests Wider Search Bar, Possibly for Longer Queries
data.Description: Google Search tests a wider search bar seroundtable.com/google-search-…

data.Title: Reddit Not Blocking Google Search, Confirms Continued Indexing
data.Description: Despite rumors, Reddit confirms it is not blocking Google Search from crawling and indexing its content, ensuring continued visibility in search results.

data.Title: Cloudflare Launches Tool to Block AI Crawlers and Scrapers for Free
data.Description: Cloudflare introduces a new feature allowing users to block AI crawlers, scrapers, and bots with a single click, providing a free solution to protect content from unauthorized use.

data.Title: OpenAI Updates ChatGPT macOS App with Local Conversation Encryption
data.Description: OpenAI releases an update for its ChatGPT macOS app, enabling local encryption of conversations following a discovery of plain text storage vulnerability.

data.Title: Zero Click Searches Decline, New Study Shows
data.Description: New Google zero click study from @randfish is out - zero clicks went from 65% to 58.5% (new data)
